```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
hospital_data = read_excel("./data/GHProject_Dataset.xlsx") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  separate(col = admitdtm, into = c("dayofweek", "month", "day", "year")) %>% 
  select(-dayofweek) %>% 
  mutate(month = recode(hospital_data$month, "January" = 1, "February" = 2, "March" = 3, "April" = 4, "May" = 5, "June" = 6, "July" = 7, "August" = 8, "September" = 9, "October" = 10, "November" = 11, "December" = 12)) %>% 
  unite(month, day, year, col = "date", sep = "-")
```
